id, name, phone, start, end, content, price, beginTime, createTime, status, startMap, endMap, order_no, endTime, cust_no, receiveMoney, receiveText, costMoney, visit, source, type, is_clean, cleanText, payState, salesman, costText, cleanEmp, workTime
mapper.update: update sys_order set deleteStatus = 1 where id = #{id}
update sys_order set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select r.id, r.name, r.phone, r.start, r.end, r.content, r.price, r.beginTime, r.createTime, r.status, r.startMap, r.endMap, r.order_no, r.endTime, r.cust_no, r.receiveMoney, r.receiveText, r.costMoney, r.visit, r.source, r.type, r.payState, r.salesman, r.is_clean, r.cleanText, r.workTime from sys_order r where r.deleteStatus = 0 and r.name = #{name} and r.cust_no = #{cust_no} and r.order_no = #{order_no} and r.status = #{status} and r.payState = #{payState} and r.salesman = #{salesman} and r.createTime >= #{createTime1} and r.createTime <= #{createTime2} and r.beginTime >= #{beginTime1} and r.beginTime <= #{beginTime2} order by r.createTime desc

SELECT o.id, o.`start`, o.`end`, o.`name`, o.phone, o.price, o.beginTime, o.`status`, o.order_no, o.endTime, so.emp_no, so.createTime AS dispatchTime FROM sys_order AS o LEFT JOIN sys_send_order AS so ON so.order_no = o.order_no WHERE o.deleteStatus = 0 and so.emp_no = #{emp_no} and o.status = #{status} and o.beginTime >= #{beginTime1} and o.beginTime <= #{beginTime2} GROUP BY o.order_no ORDER BY dispatchTime DESC
